thread.section_title: Antico Palazzo Rospigliosi - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of Antico Palazzo Rospigliosi, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Josiceli T
title: Nice hotel
text: The hotel has some age but still very well maintained.The room was small but with very comfortable bed. Big toilet. Really great location, nice staff always polite and helpful. Parking space available. The negative points were the water pipe noise in our room in the mornings and very much disappointed with breakfast. Hot options were kept in the dish with light candles which would never keep it hot and very poor options on the buffet in a 4* hotel. Not having breakfast at the hotel I would definitely stay there on my next time in Rome.
